title: Precision Agriculture
subtitle: Maximizing Efficiency, Minimizing Waste

overview.title: Smarter Farming, Higher Yields
overview.content: Precision Agriculture leverages real-time data, AI analytics, and satellite imagery to enable farmers to manage crops more efficiently. It empowers decision-making, minimizes waste, and ensures maximum productivity with minimal resource consumption.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Our precision agriculture technology collects multispectral imagery, soil health data, and weather parameters to guide field-level recommendations. Farmers can apply inputs like fertilizer and pesticides only where needed — cutting costs and improving soil health.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Increase yields by up to 30%
Reduce water consumption by 40%
Lower chemical usage by 50%
Make data-driven input decisions

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: AI-powered crop monitoring
Remote sensing with NDVI & NDRE
IoT-based soil and climate sensors
Cloud-based dashboard with live analytics

title: Crop Spraying and Monitoring
subtitle: Unparalleled Accuracy and Insight
description: Comprehensive approach combining Vaigo's physical capabilities with AI-powered analytical insights
features: High-Efficiency Spraying with large payload capacity
Real-time Crop Health Assessment with multispectral imaging
Automated Pest and Disease Detection 7-10 days in advance

overview.title: Targeted Treatment, Optimized Results
overview.content: This solution provides pinpoint accuracy in crop spraying, minimizing drift and waste. By integrating real-time monitoring, farmers can ensure treatments are applied precisely when and where they are most effective, maximizing crop health and minimizing costs.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Using specialized drone technology and multispectral imaging, we identify specific areas of stress or disease. The system then generates precise application maps, ensuring the spraying payload is distributed only to the targeted zones.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Improve treatment accuracy by 95%
Reduce chemical waste and cost by up to 50%
Faster field coverage than traditional methods
Ensure compliance with precision application records

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: High-capacity drone sprayers
AI-driven anomaly detection
Multispectral and hyperspectral sensors
Automated mission planning and execution

features: Multi-Source Data Integration from drones, satellites, and IoT

overview.title: Turning Data into Dollars
overview.content: This platform is the brain of your digital farm, integrating all sensor, drone, and satellite data into a single, comprehensive view. It uses advanced machine learning to provide predictive insights, helping you move from reactive farming to proactive, profitable decision-making.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Raw data streams are normalized and fed into our proprietary AI models. The system analyzes historical data against real-time conditions (weather, soil health, crop indices) to forecast outcomes and generate precise, prioritized recommendations.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Predict yield with over 90% accuracy
Identify and mitigate risks early (drought, pests)
Benchmark field performance across years/locations
Generate professional, compliance-ready reports

list: Cloud-based big data infrastructure

overview.title: Your Farm, Digitally Replicated
overview.content: Our Farm Management solution uses Digital Twin technology to create a living, virtual model of your farm. This allows for predictive planning, automated task delegation, and granular control over every asset and operation, ensuring maximum operational efficiency and cost control.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: The Digital Twin constantly updates with real-time data from all sources (weather, machinery, sensors). This model allows the system to simulate interventions and automatically generate optimal work orders, dispatching tasks to field teams or autonomous equipment.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Reduce operational costs through resource optimization
Ensure immutable record-keeping with Blockchain integration
Increase labor efficiency via automated task assignment
Holistic risk modeling through the Digital Twin

title: Field Insight Dashboard
subtitle: Real-time Field Intelligence
description: Track crop growth, detect stress, and receive actionable alerts using Vaigo's satellite and aerial analytics.
features: AI-based field stress and pest detection

overview.title: The Pulse of Your Fields
overview.content: The Field Insight Dashboard is your central hub for crop intelligence, providing a real-time, visual overview of all your plots. It uses advanced analytics to translate complex aerial and satellite data into simple, actionable alerts for immediate intervention.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: High-frequency satellite and aerial imagery feeds into the platform, calculating vegetation indices (NDVI, NDRE). AI algorithms continuously scan for anomalies, instantly highlighting areas of low vigor or potential pest outbreaks, visualized on an interactive map.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Pinpoint areas for immediate scouting and intervention
Track crop development progress throughout the season
Integrate multi-source data into one easy interface
Receive customized alerts via mobile or email

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Global satellite imagery API
Real-time vegetation indices calculation
Customizable GIS mapping layers
Role-based access controls for enterprise users

title: Digital Farm Detection
subtitle: Smart Boundary Mapping
description: Automatically detect farm plots and boundaries to enable zonal management and accurate area calculations.

overview.title: Accurate Boundaries, Precise Management
overview.content: Digital Farm Detection leverages AI to accurately map and digitize farm boundaries, even in areas with complex or fragmented land divisions. This foundational geospatial data is crucial for all precision agriculture practices, from area calculation to zonal management.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Using high-resolution aerial imagery and proprietary algorithms, the system identifies and traces the precise perimeters of cultivated land. It differentiates between crops, fallow land, and surrounding features, generating clean, digital GIS boundaries for every field.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Foundation for all VRA and precision planning
Ensure accurate land area calculation for subsidies and payments
Quickly digitize farm assets at scale
Seamless integration into major farm management software

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Edge detection and computer vision algorithms
High-accuracy geo-referencing
Automated boundary refinement tools
Vector data output in industry-standard formats

title: Canopy Health Surveillance
subtitle: Forest & Canopy Analytics
description: Monitor forest cover, canopy health and detect deforestation or fires using satellite analytics and time-series analysis.

overview.title: Protecting Natural Assets
overview.content: Our Canopy Health Surveillance solution extends beyond crops to monitor large-scale forest and natural assets. Utilizing satellite time-series data and AI, it provides early detection for environmental threats like illegal deforestation and wildfires, supporting conservation efforts and sustainability compliance.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: The platform analyzes historical and current multi-spectral data to establish biomass and canopy cover baselines. Any significant, rapid deviation triggers automated alerts, allowing environmental teams to respond quickly to threats and minimize ecological damage.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Real-time alerts for illegal logging and fire risk
Quantify carbon sequestration potential
Validate compliance with environmental sustainability metrics
Track long-term forest degradation or recovery trends

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Sentinel-2 and Landsat satellite data processing
Time-series anomaly detection AI
Biomass calculation models
Automated reporting for ESG compliance

title: Aerial Data Command Center
subtitle: Aerial Field Intelligence
description: High-resolution drone capture and automated analysis for orthomosaics, canopy health mapping, and pest detection.

overview.title: Drone Data, Processed Instantly
overview.content: This platform streamlines the entire drone data pipeline, from flight planning and image capture to automated processing and analysis. It provides ultra-high-resolution data essential for pinpoint diagnosis of issues like nutrient deficiencies and early-stage pest infestations.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Drone imagery is uploaded to the cloud platform where it is automatically stitched into georeferenced orthomosaics. AI then analyzes these detailed maps to identify and count features, detect anomalies, and generate immediate field report summaries for scouting teams.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Ultra-high-resolution data for granular insights
Automate image processing, saving hours of manual work
Generate VRA prescriptions directly from drone data
Faster field reporting and response times

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Photogrammetry and stitching algorithms
Cloud-based high-performance computing
Mobile-optimized data viewing and reporting
Compatibility with all major agricultural drone platforms

title: Arbor Health Analytics
subtitle: Orchard & Plantation Analytics
description: Precise tree counting, canopy scoring and health analytics tailored for orchards and tree crops.

overview.title: Precision Care for Tree Crops
overview.content: Arbor Health Analytics is specifically designed for the unique challenges of managing orchards and large-scale plantations. It moves beyond general crop metrics to provide detailed, tree-by-tree analysis for health, canopy size, and projected yield, maximizing the return on perennial investments.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: The system processes high-resolution imagery (drone or satellite) to isolate individual tree canopies. It then calculates metrics like canopy volume, vigor (using NDVI), and tree count. This data informs targeted pruning, irrigation, and fertilization plans.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Accurately count and map every tree in the orchard
Identify individual trees with sub-optimal health for targeted care
Forecast harvest readiness and optimize logistics
Monitor the success of pruning and fertilization programs

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: 3D modeling and photogrammetry (for volume)
Object detection AI for tree counting
Canopy closure and shadow analysis
Specialized orchard-level reporting dashboards

title: Yield Forecast Engine
subtitle: Yield & Risk Forecasting
description: Machine-learning models that forecast yield, detect likely stress zones and help plan interventions in advance.

overview.title: Predicting Tomorrow's Harvest Today
overview.content: The Yield Forecast Engine uses sophisticated machine learning to provide accurate, real-time predictions of final harvest yields. By analyzing weather, soil, and biomass data, it minimizes market risk and allows for precise logistics and storage planning.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Our proprietary AI models combine historical yield data with in-season variables (e.g., accumulated heat units, water stress indices, current biomass). This multidimensional analysis generates probabilistic yield estimates, which are continuously updated as the season progresses.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Minimize market risk with reliable yield predictions
Optimize labor, storage, and transport logistics
Identify and act on high-risk, low-potential zones early
Provide accurate data for insurance and financing purposes

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Time-series predictive modeling (ML)
Global weather and climate data inputs
Scenario planning simulators
API for integration with trading and finance platforms

overview.content: The Asset Location Toolkit provides enterprise clients (Co-ops, Governments, Large Holdings) with the tools to manage vast agricultural areas. It accurately identifies, maps, and maintains a registry of plots and infrastructure for robust asset management and regional planning.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Combining high-resolution mapping with AI, the toolkit automatically detects field boundaries, irrigation networks, and farm structures. It provides specialized tools for quality control and refinement of these digital assets, ensuring geospatial accuracy across millions of hectares.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Create a foundational, accurate farm asset registry
Ensure consistency and quality across large, diverse portfolios
Bulk export data for seamless integration with legacy GIS systems
Reduce costs associated with manual asset audits and mapping

list: Enterprise-grade cloud mapping service

title: EcoFarm Stewardship Platform
subtitle: Climate-Smart Farming Tools
description: Tools to track sustainable practices, compute carbon footprints and prepare certification-ready reports for stakeholders.

overview.title: Quantifying Sustainability and Impact
overview.content: The EcoFarm Stewardship Platform is designed for the modern farmer and enterprise focused on climate-smart agriculture. It automates the tracking of sustainable practices, computes carbon metrics, and generates verified reports necessary for ESG reporting, certification, and accessing carbon markets.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Farmers log inputs (fertilizer, fuel, water) which are combined with satellite-derived data on soil organic carbon and biomass. The platform’s proprietary models calculate the farm's net emissions and sustainability score, providing a clear path to environmental improvement.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Access high-value carbon credit markets
Ensure compliance with global ESG standards and buyer requirements
Measure and reduce the farm's environmental footprint
Provide verifiable data to consumers and investors

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Carbon footprint calculation engine (based on IPCC standards)
Data logging and input tracking module
Geo-referenced sustainability scoring
API for integration with compliance and reporting platforms

title: Water-Use Optimization Model
subtitle: Water-Use Optimization
description: Model irrigation schedules and conserve water using soil moisture, evapotranspiration and weather-driven analytics.
features: Actionable recommendations to reduce water use

overview.title: Water Smarter, Not Harder
overview.content: This model integrates real-time soil moisture data, weather forecasts, and satellite-derived evapotranspiration (ET) estimates to create highly optimized irrigation schedules. The result is significant water conservation, energy savings, and the prevention of yield loss due to over or under-watering.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: The platform calculates the exact daily water needs of the crop based on its growth stage and atmospheric demand (ET). It then schedules irrigation events by cross-referencing this need with current soil moisture levels, ensuring water is applied with perfect timing and volume.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Reduce water consumption by up to 40%
Minimize energy costs associated with pumping water
Prevent water-stress related yield loss
Automate irrigation scheduling for hands-free operation

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Evapotranspiration (ET) modeling
IoT soil moisture sensor integration
Weather forecast API integration
Compatibility with smart irrigation control systems

title: AI Crop Classifier
subtitle: Instant Identification of Crop Variety
description: Automatically detect crop types across seasons with machine learning models trained on multispectral data.

overview.title: Automated Crop Type Identification
overview.content: The AI Crop Classifier uses deep learning on multi-source satellite and aerial imagery to instantly and accurately identify crop types across vast areas. This is essential for regional planning, market analysis, and targeted agricultural support programs.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Our machine learning models are trained on extensive spectral and temporal datasets to recognize unique signatures of over 100 crop varieties. The system processes large-scale imagery, generating a geo-referenced map of crop distribution with high confidence scores.

sections.title: Benefits
list: Instant, large-scale mapping of crop distribution
High accuracy for over 100 global crop types
Essential data for commodity trading and policy makers
Automate and replace expensive manual field surveys

sections.title: Technology Stack
list: Deep learning and Neural Networks
High-resolution satellite imagery integration
Scalable batch processing engine
Exportable GIS layer formats (GeoJSON, Shapefile)
